00028 static bool IsEqual( const MVec3& left, const MVec3& right )
00029 {
00030         return ( left.GetX() == right.GetX() && left.GetY() == right.GetY() && left.GetZ() == right.GetZ() );
00031 }

00058 //----------------------------------------------------------
00059 GrBSPTree::GrBSPTree( const GrPolygonBSPTree& polygonBSPTree, const GrPolygonUberUVMapper& mapper )
00060 : _root( 0 )
00061 , _inScene( false )
00062 {
00064         std::vector< GrMeshCombiner* > combinerVector;
00065         _root = new GrBSPSplit( combinerVector, *polygonBSPTree.GetRoot(), mapper );
00066         _root->GetAreas( _areas );
00067 
00069         char buf[ 20 ];
00070         unsigned int i = 0;
00071         std::vector< GrMeshCombiner* >::iterator iter = combinerVector.begin();
00072         const std::vector< GrMeshCombiner* >::iterator end = combinerVector.end();
00073         for ( ; iter != end; ++iter, ++i )
00074         {
00076                 _itoa_s( i, buf, 20, 10 );
00077 
00079                 GrMeshCombiner* curCombiner = ( *iter );
00080                 GrMeshInst* meshInst = curCombiner->BuildFinalMesh( buf );
00081                 _meshes.push_back( meshInst );
00082 
00084                 delete ( *iter );
00085         }
00086 }

00100 void
00101 GrBSPTree::SetInScene( bool inScene )
00102 {
00104         if ( _inScene == inScene )
00105                 return;
00106 
00107         void* test = malloc( 200 );
00108         tstring* str = new( test ) tstring;
00109 
00111         _inScene = inScene;
00112 
00114         if ( inScene )
00115                 AddLightsToScene();
00116         else
00117                 RemoveLightsFromScene();
00118 }

00158 GrBSPTree::Pick( GrMeshInst*& meshInst, GrMesh::STriCollision& hit, const MRay& ray )
00159 {
00161         if ( !_root )
00162                 return false;
00163 
00165         return _root->Pick( meshInst, hit, _meshes, ray );

00177 //----------------------------------------------------------
00178 void
00179 GrBSPTree::Cache()
00180 {
00181         unsigned int meshCount = ( unsigned int )_meshes.size();
00182         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < meshCount; ++i )
00183                 _meshes[ i ]->Cache();
00184 
00185 }

00188 void
00189 GrBSPTree::Evict()
00190 {
00191         unsigned int meshCount = ( unsigned int )_meshes.size();
00192         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < meshCount; ++i )
00193                 _meshes[ i ]->Evict();

00196 //----------------------------------------------------------
00197 void
00198 GrBSPTree::GetLitObjectsAndMarkVisible( GrRenderList& lightReceivers, const GrFrustum& frustum, const MVec3& sceneEyePos,
00199                                                                             unsigned int frameId ) const
00200 {
00202         if ( _root == 0 )
00203                 return;
00204 
00206         GrBSPArea *area = _root->GetArea( sceneEyePos );
00207         if ( !area )
00208                 return;
00209 
00211         const GrBSPArea::IndexArray& visibleAreas = area->GetVisibleAreas();
00212 
00214         GrBSPArea::IndexArray::const_iterator iter = visibleAreas.begin();
00215         GrBSPArea::IndexArray::const_iterator end = visibleAreas.end();
00216         for ( ; iter != end; ++iter )
00217         {
00219                 GrBSPArea* curArea = _areas[ *iter ];
00220                 if ( frustum.IsAABoxInside( curArea->GetBoundingBox() ) )
00221                 {
00223                         curArea->SetLastVisibleFrameID( frameId );
00224 
00226                         GrUberPatchSet* curAreaPatchSet = curArea->GetUberPatchSet();
00227                         if ( curAreaPatchSet )
00228                                 lightReceivers.AddUberPatchSet( curAreaPatchSet );
00229 
00231                         unsigned int meshInstCount = curArea->GetMeshInstCount();
00232                         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < meshInstCount; ++i )
00233                         {
00235                                 const GrBSPArea::SMeshInstInfo& curMeshInstInfo = curArea->GetMeshInst( i );
00236 
00238                                 unsigned int rangeEnd = curMeshInstInfo.rangeStart + curMeshInstInfo.rangeCount;
00239                                 for ( unsigned int j = curMeshInstInfo.rangeStart; j < rangeEnd; ++j )
00240                                 {
00242                                         GrMeshInst* curMeshInst = _meshes[ curMeshInstInfo.meshInstIdx ];
00243                                         const MAABox& curBox = curMeshInst->GetMesh()->GetRangeAABox( j );
00244                                         if ( frustum.IsAABoxInside( curBox ) )
00245                                         {
00247                                                 curArea->SetMeshInstLastVisibleFrameID( i, frameId );
00248                                                 lightReceivers.AddMeshInstRange( curMeshInst, j, true );
00249                                         }
00250                                 }
00251                         }
00252                 }
00253         }
00254 }

00256 //----------------------------------------------------------
00257 bool
00258 GrBSPTree::GetLitObjects( GrRenderList& lightReceivers, GrRenderList* shadowCasters, const MSphere& region,
00259                                                   unsigned int frameId ) const
00260 {
00262         if ( _root == 0 )
00263                 return false;
00264 
00266         GrBSPArea *area = _root->GetArea( region.GetCenter() );
00267         if ( !area )
00268                 return false;
00269 
00271         const GrBSPArea::IndexArray& visibleAreas = area->GetVisibleAreas();
00272 
00274         GrBSPArea::IndexArray::const_iterator iter = visibleAreas.begin();
00275         GrBSPArea::IndexArray::const_iterator end = visibleAreas.end();
00276 
00278         for ( ; iter != end; ++iter )
00279                 if ( _areas[ *iter ]->GetLastVisibleFrameID() == frameId )
00280                         break;
00281 
00283         if ( iter == end )
00284                 return false;
00285 
00286         iter = visibleAreas.begin();
00287         if ( shadowCasters )
00288         {
00291                 for ( ; iter != end; ++iter )
00292                 {
00294                         GrBSPArea* curArea = _areas[ *iter ];
00295 
00297                         if ( curArea->GetBoundingBox().Intersect( region ) )
00298                         {
00301                                 unsigned int meshInstCount = curArea->GetMeshInstCount();
00302                                 for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < meshInstCount; ++i )
00303                                 {
00305                                         const GrBSPArea::SMeshInstInfo& curMeshInstInfo = curArea->GetMeshInst( i );
00306 
00308                                         unsigned int rangeEnd = curMeshInstInfo.rangeStart + curMeshInstInfo.rangeCount;
00309                                         for ( unsigned int j = curMeshInstInfo.rangeStart; j < rangeEnd; ++j )
00310                                         {
00312                                                 GrMeshInst* curMeshInst = _meshes[ curMeshInstInfo.meshInstIdx ];
00313 
00315                                                 const MAABox& curBounds = curMeshInst->GetMesh()->GetRangeAABox( j );
00316                                                 if ( curBounds.Intersect( region ) )
00317                                                 {
00319                                                         if ( curMeshInstInfo.lastVisibleFrameId == frameId )
00320                                                                 lightReceivers.AddMeshInstRange( curMeshInst, j, true );
00321 
00323                                                         shadowCasters->AddMeshInstRange( curMeshInst, j, true );
00324                                                 }
00325                                         }
00326                                 }
00327                         }
00328                 }
00329         }
00330         else
00331         {
00332                 for ( ; iter != end; ++iter )
00333                 {
00335                         GrBSPArea* curArea = _areas[ *iter ];
00336 
00338                         if ( curArea->GetLastVisibleFrameID() == frameId && curArea->GetBoundingBox().Intersect( region ) )
00339                         {
00342                                 unsigned int meshInstCount = curArea->GetMeshInstCount();
00343                                 for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < meshInstCount; ++i )
00344                                 {
00346                                         const GrBSPArea::SMeshInstInfo& curMeshInstInfo = curArea->GetMeshInst( i );
00347 
00349                                         unsigned int rangeEnd = curMeshInstInfo.rangeStart + curMeshInstInfo.rangeCount;
00350                                         for ( unsigned int j = curMeshInstInfo.rangeStart; j < rangeEnd; ++j )
00351                                         {
00353                                                 GrMeshInst* curMeshInst = _meshes[ curMeshInstInfo.meshInstIdx ];
00354 
00356                                                 const MAABox& curBounds = curMeshInst->GetMesh()->GetRangeAABox( j );
00357                                                 if ( curMeshInstInfo.lastVisibleFrameId == frameId && curBounds.Intersect( region ) )
00358                                                         lightReceivers.AddMeshInstRange( curMeshInst, j, true );
00359                                         }
00360                                 }
00361                         }
00362                 }
00363         }
00364 
00365         return true;
00366 }

00480 //----------------------------------------------------------
00481 bool                    
00482 GrBSPTree::GetObjectsInFrustum( GrRenderList& objects, const GrFrustum& region ) const
00483 {
00485         if ( _root == 0 )
00486                 return false;
00487 
00489         GrBSPArea *area = _root->GetArea( region.GetPos() );
00490         if ( !area )
00491                 return false;
00492 
00494         const GrBSPArea::IndexArray& visibleAreas = area->GetVisibleAreas();
00495 
00497         GrBSPArea::IndexArray::const_iterator iter = visibleAreas.begin();
00498         GrBSPArea::IndexArray::const_iterator end = visibleAreas.end();
00499         for ( ; iter != end; ++iter )
00500         {
00502                 GrBSPArea* curArea = _areas[ *iter ];
00503 
00505                 if ( region.IsAABoxInside( curArea->GetBoundingBox() ) )
00506                 {
00509                         unsigned int meshInstCount = curArea->GetMeshInstCount();
00510                         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < meshInstCount; ++i )
00511                         {
00513                                 const GrBSPArea::SMeshInstInfo& curMeshInstInfo = curArea->GetMeshInst( i );
00514 
00516                                 unsigned int rangeEnd = curMeshInstInfo.rangeStart + curMeshInstInfo.rangeCount;
00517                                 for ( unsigned int j = curMeshInstInfo.rangeStart; j < rangeEnd; ++j )
00518                                 {
00520                                         GrMeshInst* curMeshInst = _meshes[ curMeshInstInfo.meshInstIdx ];
00521 
00523                                         const MAABox& curBounds = curMeshInst->GetMesh()->GetRangeAABox( j );
00524                                         if ( region.IsAABoxInside( curBounds ) )
00525                                                 objects.AddMeshInstRange( curMeshInst, j, true );
00526                                 }
00527                         }
00528                 }
00529         }
00530 
00531         return true;
00532 }

00565 //----------------------------------------------------------
00566 void
00567 GrBSPTree::Load( UReader& reader )
00568 {
00569         Clean();
00570 
00572         unsigned int meshCount = reader.ReadUInt();
00573         _meshes.resize( meshCount );
00574         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < meshCount; ++i )
00575         {
00577                 URef< GrMesh > mesh = new GrMesh( reader );
00578                 _meshes[ i ] = new GrMeshInst( reader, mesh );
00579         }
00580 
00582         unsigned int lightCount = reader.ReadUInt();
00583         tstring errors;
00584         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < lightCount; ++i )
00585         {
00586                 tstring lightName = reader.ReadString();
00587                 GrLight* light = gGrLightMgr->GetLight( lightName, errors );
00588                 _lights.AddLight( light );
00589         }
00590 
00592         _root = new GrBSPSplit( reader );
00593         _root->GetAreas( _areas );
00594 }
00595 
00596 //----------------------------------------------------------
00597 void
00598 GrBSPTree::Save( UWriter& writer )
00599 {
00601         unsigned int meshCount = ( unsigned int )_meshes.size();
00602         writer.WriteUInt( meshCount );
00603         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < meshCount; ++i )
00604         {
00607                 _meshes[ i ]->GetMesh()->Save( writer );
00608                 _meshes[ i ]->Save( writer );
00609         }
00610 
00612         unsigned int lightCount = _lights.GetLightCount();
00613         writer.WriteUInt( lightCount );
00614         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < lightCount; ++i )
00615                 writer.WriteString( _lights.GetLight( i )->GetId().GetPathString() );
00616 
00618         _root->Save( writer );
00619 }

00626 //----------------------------------------------------------
00627 void
00628 GrBSPTree::AddLightsToScene()
00629 {
00630         unsigned int lightCount = _lights.GetLightCount();
00631         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < lightCount; ++i )
00632                 gGrScene->AddLight( _lights.GetLight( i ) );
00633 }
00634 
00635 //----------------------------------------------------------
00636 void
00637 GrBSPTree::RemoveLightsFromScene()
00638 {
00639         unsigned int lightCount = _lights.GetLightCount();
00640         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < lightCount; ++i )
00641                 gGrScene->RemoveLight( _lights.GetLight( i ) );
00642 }

00644 //----------------------------------------------------------
00645 void
00646 GrBSPTree::Clean()
00647 {
00649         delete _root;
00650         _root = 0;
00651 
00653         _lights.Clear();
00654 
00656         _areas.clear();
00657 
00659         MeshInstVec::iterator iter = _meshes.begin();
00660         const MeshInstVec::iterator end = _meshes.end();
00661         for ( ; iter != end; ++iter )
00662                 delete ( *iter );
00663 
00665         _meshes.clear();
00666 }
